titles.title: Protecting Married Seniors from Impoverishment Act
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to remove an institutional bias by making permanent the protection for recipients of home and community-based services against spousal impoverishment.
Protecting Married Seniors from Impoverishment Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Protecting Married Seniors from Impoverishment Act
This bill makes permanent certain provisions regarding Medicaid eligibility that protect against spousal impoverishment for recipients of home and community-based services. Under current law, these provisions expire on December 31, 2018.
